Synthetic Data

mdcr.Rd

Synthetic Data

Usage

mdcr

Format

mdcr is a data.frame with 4 columns, one for a patient id and 41 for diagnostic codes and 41 possible procedure codes. Each row is for one patient id.

  • patid: patient identifier, integer values

  • icdv: ICD version; integer values, 9 or 10

  • dx: indicator column for ICD diagnostic (1) or procedure (0) codes

  • code: ICD code; character values

See also

Other datasets: mdcr_longitudinal
